t: 9 Tire Brands Owned By Michelin - SlashGear
s: 1 week ago - Rather than acquire one tire brand in a single sale, Michelin went for a larger corporation that already owned two in 2019. That company was Multistrada, an Indonesian group that covers the Achilles and Corsa brands. Achilles isn't too far off from the previously mentioned budget brands, though ...
